info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perquimans, east central Bertie and southern Chowan Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cape Colony, or 13 miles southwest of Hertford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rain 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Possible flooding of low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Edenton, Cape Colony, Valhalla, Midway, Drummond Point, Mavaton, Edenhouse, Saint Johns, Mount Gould, Hancock, Yeopim Station, Light Nixon Fork, Macedonia, Somerset and Holiday Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
